ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+
ygData.msgSnippet: Only 2 places like that are Vox s lair (only inside it where she is, NOT  the rest of the zone) and Naggy s lair (same thing). Any OTHER part of the zone is
ygData.messageBody:
Only 2 places like that are Vox's lair (only inside it where she is, NOT  the rest of the zone) and Naggy's lair (same thing). Any OTHER part of the zone is 100% normal for all levels, and can be gone into. As for exp...try Karnor's and  OS. Jaggedpine might be a good bet too.
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, July 28, 2002 12:38 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+

Ok now that my cleric is lvl 52, I'm trying to find a good place to hunt to
get xp. Also, are there any parts of my epic that I can do out of order.
Like can I kill some mob in nagafen's lair or such without doing the other
parts first? Or does the king something or other.. whatever it is there..
does it have to be triggered by the quest to spawn? I'm worried that I will
hit one of those zones where if you are over 52 you will be banished to zone
beginning so I want to do what I can while lower lvl and then do the higher
lvl stuff once I've gone up more.
Any suggestions?
luv,
-Su
